comments: I think he is very good teacher, as long as you respect him as a professor, and listen to his lecture/notes. you will be fine for this class. his writting is not very good, so you need to look at the textbook. English is my second language, but I had a good grade on this class. His voice is loud, I don\'t think he yells at students. He is nice.

One of the worst teachers I\'ve had to date. Very arrogant. Yells at students for asking questions, has a fit if you want to see a graded test, unfair grading system, horrible handwriting but still handwrites all notes on board. Do not take this teacher!
